item.name: General - Blackbird named plugin is sending data
Network - TCP Port {$ITM_NAMED_PORT} is in LISTENING state
Network - UDP Port {$ITM_NAMED_PORT} is in LISTENING state
Simple - TCP Port {$ITM_NAMED_PORT} is accepting connection(s)

trigger.name: Named - Recursive clients are reached to upper limit
Named - TCP clients are reached to upper limit
Network - Named TCP port might be down
Network - Named UDP port might be down
